name: For a New Glory Part 2
description:
Things are worse than before.  Your father has died, and with that, the world shakes as the only hyperpower, Luyene suffers with a Civil War between your twin and your younger brother.  

The worst is that your parents aren't even fully dead and one of them is a total necromancer. 

Later, your younger brother made a Weltkrieg against La Plata, a country in South America who has done nothing to the world.  Samuel, your brother says that they are fascist and opressing the platinese people and has motivated THE ENTIRE PLANET to fight them. 

After all of this... your own best friend ends up betraying you and MAKES A FRICKING COUP D' ETAT that ends with her death. 

How will you react to all of this?  Discover it by downloading the game.
